straskal_debugdraw.name: DebugDraw
straskal_debugdraw.description: Enables various debug drawing capablities during runtime.

is-enabled.name: Enabled
is-enabled.desc: Whether or not the debug renderer is initially enabled.

draw-bbs.name: Draw
draw-bbs.desc: Whether or not to draw bounding boxes.

bb-solids-only.name: Solids only
bb-solids-only.desc: Whether or not to only draw solids.

draw-polys.name: Draw
draw-polys.desc: Whether or not to draw collision polygons.

poly-solids-only.name: Solids only
poly-solids-only.desc: Whether or not to only draw solids.

draw-los.name: Draw
draw-los.desc: Whether or not to draw bounding boxes.
